_header: Never to yielden and ever to craven
_description: Aphorism in John of Grimestone’s sermon book — one couplet

NLS18721.Transcription:
Neuere to ȝelden & euere to crauenmaket man fewe frendis to
                    hauen
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 10.
